synopsis.text: Production's finest idol groups, SolidS, SOARA, QUELL, and Growth, gear up for the annual Tsukino Concert at the Budokan. The leaders of these units face the daunting task of composing four distinctive songs for their respective groups to perform on the second day of the festival. SolidS's leader, Shiki Takamura, grapples with finding inspiration, while SOARA's leader, Sora Oohara, strives to overcome past mistakes and propel his unit to the top. Meanwhile, Shuu Izumi, leader of QUELL, aims to elevate his unit to match the popularity of his previous group, and Growth's leader, Kouki Etou, reluctantly collaborates with a rival group, ZIX, prior to their debut. 'Tsukipro The Animation' offers a captivating glimpse into the daily lives and challenges faced by these four idol groups as they prepare for the highly anticipated Tsukino Concert. Immerse yourself in a world of unique music and engaging drama with this sparkling treasure box of an anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
